snippet.title: Legal Marijuana Industry Launches Its First Job Fair
snippet.description:
Legal Marijuana Industry Launches Its First Job Fair
By MainStreet 05:38 PM EDT 03/10/14
Two things in great demand - jobs and marijuana - will converge in the Mile High City on Thursday at what is being billed as "CannaSearch," the first-ever job fair for the legal marijuana industry.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12524078/1/legal-marijuana-industry-launches-its-first-job-fair.html
